exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
push=(title,url,type1,type2)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: type1,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type2
			}
	});
push("🔖小说专区🔖",null,1,1)
push("最近更新",`{{getUrl()}}novel/common?type=newest<,&page={{page+1}}>`,1,1)
push("最近上架",`{{getUrl()}}novel/common?type=last_published<,&page={{page+1}}>`,1,0.39)
push("原创首发",`{{getUrl()}}novel/common?type=original<,&page={{page+1}}>`,1,0.39)
	arList=["都市激情","校园春色","乡村爱情","系统异能","家庭乱伦","穿越重生","经典武侠","同人改编","科学幻想","东方玄幻","娱乐明星","历史架空","西方魔幻","贤者小说"]
	arList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`{{getUrl()}}novel/all?theme=${index+1}&page={{page}}
`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
		push("🔖漫画专区🔖",null,1,1)
			push('最新🌊上架',`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=1&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0
`,1,1)

	push('收藏',`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=collect_num&sort_order=2&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0
`,1,0.25)

	push('观看量',`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=0&category_sub=0&tag=1&sort_field=view_num&sort_order=2&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,0.25)
	prList=["日本漫画"]
	orList=["短篇","单本","同人"]
		prList.map((teg,ure)=>{
		push(teg,`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+1}&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,1)
	orList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+1}&category_sub=${index}&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
		});

		 mrList=["韩国H漫"]
	arList=["剧情","校园","爱情","BL","奇幻","调教","乱伦"]
	mrList.map((teg,ure)=>{
		push(teg,`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+2}&category_sub=0&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page={{page}}&limit=48&tag_id=0`,1,1)
	arList.map((tag,index)=>{
		url=`{{getUrl()}}comic/all?key_word=&title=&author=&category=${ure+2}&category_sub=${index+1}&tag=0&sort_field=refreshed_at&sort_order=1&page=1&limit=48&tag_id=0`;
		push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
				});
				push("🔖视频专区🔖",null,1,1)
				push('全部🌊视频',`{{getUrl()}}mv/all?page={{page}}`,1,1)
				push('热门🌊视频',`{{getUrl()}}mv/hot?page={{page}}`,1,0.35)
push('最近🌊更新',`{{getUrl()}}mv/new`,1,0.35)
     push('排行榜',`{{getUrl()}}mv/rank`,1,1)
			krList=[["国产视频","1",0],["日本AV","2",0],["H动漫","3",0],["偷拍自拍","1",1],["次元萝莉","1",2],["国产传媒","1",3],["主播福利","1",4],["吃瓜爆料","1",5],["无码流出","2",1],["高清AV","2",2],["同人热播","3",1],["3D动漫","3",2]]
				krList.map(([teg,ure,o])=>{
		push(teg,`{{getUrl()}}mv/all?keyword=&title=&actor=0&merchant=&category=${ure}&category_sub=${o}&page_num=1&tag=0&sort_field=id&sort_order=1&limit=48&page={{page}}`,1,0.25)
})
//java.log(JSON.stringify(sort))
JSON.stringify(sort)
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if (baseUrl['match'](/mv/)) { p = result['match'](/data\-url\=\"(.*)\"\s/); p = p ? p[0x1] : 0x1; jy=`{{getUrl()}}` let name = java['getString']('h1@text'); img=`{{@@#mse@data-poster}}` rq=`{{@@.mt-2@span.4@text}}` xh=`{{@@.mt-2@span.6@text}}` bf=`{{@@.mt-2@span.5@text}}` let intro = java['getString']('.mt-2!0@span.1@text'); let kind = java['getString']('.underline@text'); java.log(img) if (book['durChapterIndex'] == chapter['index']) { b64 = java['base64Encode'](`

${name}

📆 日期：${rq}

🎥 播放：${bf}次

📩 收藏：${xh}

🔖 标签：${kind}

🏷 简介：${intro}

`); dataUrl = 'data:text/html;base64,' + b64; java['startBrowser'](dataUrl, title); java['toast']('正在加载视频\n视频加载较慢，请耐心等待'); } '【刷新正文】播放\n✅直链:\n' + p; } else { java['getString']('main@html'); }

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)) {
	   book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾');  java.getElements('.toggleVolume,ul@.cursor-pointer');
}else if (baseUrl.match(/mv/)) {

    java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.cursor-pointer a||ul .text-base3');
}else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)){

    java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾');
    java.getElements('.cursor-pointer a||ul .text-base3');
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: {{@@span.2@text}}
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if (baseUrl.match(/http/)){
let base64 = java.base64Encode(baseUrl);
let result = `data:;base64,${base64},{"type":"url"}`;
java.put('url',result)
let url = java.base64Decode(base64);
java.ajax(url);}else{
java.ajax(java.hexDecodeToString(result))
}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x=v[0]
intro=` 
📖 书名：{{@@span.1@text##.*《|》}}
👤 作者：{{@@span.2@text##作者：}}
🔖 标签：{{@@div[style="line-height:2;"]@text##标签：}}
🕰 最新：{{@@.divbg@li.0@a@text}}
🏷 简介：{{@@.tabvalue.0@text##\s}}
⭐ 属性：
{{@@tbody.0@tr.1:2@td@text}}`
if(x>=1){
let pl = '\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新';
p=result.match(/bid\=(.*?)\'\,\s/)[1]||1;
pi=`{{getUrl()}}modules/article/reviews.php?aid=${p}&page=${x}`
po=java.ajax(pi)
r2=String(java.getString('#jieqi_page_contents>.c_row@html',po));
r2 = r2.replace(/<div class="c_subject"[\S\s]+?div>|<span class="fr"[\S\s]+?span>|回复：.+/g,'').replace(/<p[> ](.+)<\/p>/g,'⛄【$1】');
result=intro+pl+r2
result=r2?result:intro
}else if(x<1){
let pl = '\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新';
r2=String(java.getString('#content>.c_row@html'));
r2 = r2.replace(/<div class="c_subject"[\S\s]+?div>|<span class="fr"[\S\s]+?span>|回复：.+/g,'').replace(/<p[> ](.+)<\/p>/g,'\n­\n⛄【$1】');
result=intro+pl+r2
result=r2?result:intro
}
</js>

</js>

}

searchUrl:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x = v[1];
let url = `${getUrl()}modules/article/search.php`;
try {{
		url +=	`?searchkey=${key}&searchtype=all&page=${page}`
	ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
	}
code = ss.statusCode();
if (code == 302) {
	ss.header("location");
	}
	else if (code == 200) {
		`data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(url)},{'type':''}`;
	}else if (code == 502) {
		java.toast('\n'+'👻ip被拉黑了👻')
}
	}catch(err) {
		java.log('💔访问出错💔')
	}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x=v[2]
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
name=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}`
author=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}`
kind=`{{book.kind}}`
word=`{{book.wordCount}}`
last=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}`

try {
    const response = java.ajax(`{{getUrl()}}api/novel/app/novel/comments?novelId=@get:{bid}&sortType=1&page=${x}&rows=5`);
    const jsonData = JSON.parse(response);
    const logOutput = jsonData.data.map(comment => {
        const cleanNickName = comment.updateTime.replace(/T/g,'  ').replace(/\..*/g, '');
        // 根据分数生成星星显示
        const generateStars = (score) => {
            let starCount = Math.min(Math.floor(score / 2), 5);
            let stars = '';
            for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
                stars += i < starCount? '★' : '☆';
            }
            return stars;
        };
        const starDisplay = generateStars(comment.score);
        return `
  [${cleanNickName}]  ${comment.createTimeFormat}
⛄【${comment.nickName}】:👍🏻${comment.score} ${starDisplay}
 ${comment.content}
 \n­
 
`;
    }).join('\n');
    //java.log(logOutput);
} catch (error) {
    const errorLog = {
        [SyntaxError.name]: '数据解析失败: ',
        default: 'AJAX请求失败: '
    }[error.name || 'default'] + error.message;
    java.log(errorLog);
}
info = ` 
📖 书名：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}
👤 作者：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}
📜 篇幅：{{@@class.props_box@tag.ul@li.1@text}}
🔖 标签：{{@@class.tag_box@li[0:-3]@a@text##\n}}
🗿 肉量：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.0@text}}
✏  评分：{{@@class.score_box@span@text}}
🕰 最新：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}
👁 观看：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.2@text}}
❤️ 收藏：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.3@text}}
🏷 简介：{{@@class.brief@text##小说简介：}}`;
intro=info+`\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新\n­${logOutput}`
info=logOutput?intro:info
}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	name=`{{book.name}}`
		author=`{{book.author}}`
		kind=`{{book.kind}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=` 
📖 书名：{{book.name}}
👤 作者：{{book.author}}
🏷 简介：{{book.intro}}`;

	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
		name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.keywords}}`
		kind=`{{$..tags}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
   name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.authors}}`
		kind=`{{java.getString('.finished')==1?"完结":"连载"}},{{$..categories}}`
		word=``
		last=`{{$..latestUpdate}}`
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
}
data = {
    name: name,
    author: author,
    kind: kind,
    word:word,
    last: last,
    info: info
};

JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleContent.content:
if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){ var document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box"); if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) { document.select("div.line"); } else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){ result = "请刷新重试或点开上方章节链接进行验证"; }}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){ result=java.getString("#content@img@src"); result.split('\n').map(x=>``).join('\n'); }else if(baseUrl.match(/video/)){ if (book['durChapterIndex'] == chapter['index']) { b64 = java['base64Encode'](`

{{$.model.title}}

⌚️ 时长：{{$.model.durationFormat}}

📆 日期：{{$.model.onlineTime##T|.000.*## }}

🎥 播放：{{$.model.viewCount}}次

📩 收藏：{{$.model.collectCount}}

🕵 片商：{{$.model.authors}}

👤 上传：{{$.model.uploader}}

🔖 标签：{{$.model.categories}},{{$.model.tags}}

🏷 简介：{{$.model.brief}}

`); dataUrl = 'data:text/html;base64,' + b64; java['startBrowser'](dataUrl, title); java['toast']('正在加载视频\n视频加载较慢，请耐心等待'); } '【刷新正文】播放\n✅直链:\n' + `{{$.model.url}}`; }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) { java.getString('{$.model.url}') }

 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
'{{getUrl()}}novel/intro?id={{$.id}}'

'{{getUrl()}}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id={{$.id}}&viewId='+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000)
		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
'{{getUrl()}}api/audio/app/audio/intro?id={{$.id}}'
}
</js>
ruleSearch.name: $.title&&@put:{bid:$.id}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
	book.type = 8;
 java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾'); 
 var data = [];
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
 }else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	book.type = 64;
 java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾'); 
 var data=[]
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
    book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
  var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$.model.id}')+`&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);

 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data
  }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
    book.type = 32;
    java.toast('当前为听书模式🧾');
    var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/audio/app/audio/chapter?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$..latestReadChapterId}')+`&offset=0&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);
 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data

    
}
 </js>

<js>
 v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
if (x == 0){
'{{getUrl()}}'+
'api/novel/app/novel/search?category=&excludeTags=&keyword={{key}}&orderType=0&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
}else if (x == 1) {
	'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/comic/app/comic/search?keyword={{key}}&orderType=1&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
	}else if (x == 2 ) {
'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/video/app/video/search?keyword={{key}}&orderType=1&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
		}else if (x == 3 ) {
'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/audio/app/audio/search?category=&keyword={{encodeURIComponent(key)}}&orderType=0&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=42'
}
</js>
